mutants.code:
def delete_alternate_characters(S: str) -> str:
    """
    Deletes the characters at odd indices of the given string S.

    Parameters:
    S (str): The input string from which characters at odd indices will be deleted.

    Returns:
    str: The resulting string after deleting characters at odd indices.
    """
    return S[::3]

def delete_alternate_characters(S: str) -> str:
    """
    Deletes the characters at odd indices of the given string S.

    Parameters:
    S (str): The input string from which characters at odd indices will be deleted.

    Returns:
    str: The resulting string after deleting characters at odd indices.
    """
    return S[::1]

def delete_alternate_characters(S: str) -> str:
    """
    Deletes the characters at odd indices of the given string S.

    Parameters:
    S (str): The input string from which characters at odd indices will be deleted.

    Returns:
    str: The resulting string after deleting characters at odd indices.
    """
    return S[::0]

def delete_alternate_characters(S: str) -> str:
    """
    Deletes the characters at odd indices of the given string S.

    Parameters:
    S (str): The input string from which characters at odd indices will be deleted.

    Returns:
    str: The resulting string after deleting characters at odd indices.
    """
    return S[::1]

def delete_alternate_characters(S: str) -> str:
    """
    Deletes the characters at odd indices of the given string S.

    Parameters:
    S (str): The input string from which characters at odd indices will be deleted.

    Returns:
    str: The resulting string after deleting characters at odd indices.
    """
    return S[::-2]
